div.p: All children that will be 4 years old on or before September 1, 2020, may register to attend 4K for the 2020-2021 school year.
Please use the link below to view related district information regarding COVID-19. We will be continuing with remote learning until at least April 24th.

a.title: Read More on 'COVID-19 Information and Updates'
a.aria-label: Read More on 'COVID-19 Information and Updates'
a.alt: Read More on 'COVID-19 Information and Updates'

div.p: You may apply for open enrollment from February 3 - May 29, 2020. See our website for further information.
